name: Stonepunk 2077 B.C.
description:
You play as Ooga Booga, a caveman that gets access to gun technology in a city made of stone & dirt. But thats not all, the Stink Gangers also have guns, but the city is sick of them running the city, so its up to you to defeat all of the stink gangers so that you can run them out & bring peace to Stone City set in the year 2077 B.C.

(NOTICE** We have hired a group of popular modders within the community to help fix bugs, please be patient as we work to deliver you a full game soon ♥)

FULL DISCLOSURE! @POLYMARS & @BARJI challenged me to a 12 hour gamejam, without that, this game would have never been made.
